channel.title: PI teleporting
channel.description:
Hmm i am working on a big project and kinda ran into a problem last night.. i want to make it when you try to click on this portal to teleport you can't have any armour or anything in your inventory. if you do it won't let you go in. how would i do that? please someone help me. i would be extremely thankful.
Re-Cap- I want to make it so when you click this portal you may not have any armour on or anything in inventory. Thank you .

item.title: PI teleporting
item.dc:creator: @lifezjoke lifezjoke
item.description:
@lifezjoke wrote:

I added this:

case 2158: for (int i = 0; i < 14; i++) { c.getItems().removeItem(c.playerEquipment[i], i); if (c.getItems().freeSlots() >= 28) { c.getPA().movePlayer(2662, 9803, 0); } else { c.sendMessage("Your inventory must to be empty before you can enter Curse Dungeon."); return; } } break;

I added that and when i click the object 2158 and it doesn’t even teleport me nor send message “Your inventory must be empty before you can enter Curse Dungeon.”

Anyone please help … what can i do to make this code work, i placed it somewhere in actionhandler.java

Read full topic

item.title: PI teleporting
item.dc:creator: @relexlawl relexlawl
item.description:
@relexlawl wrote:

mhmm

EDIT: wow just realized the code got messed up for no apperent reason…

its like this

case ####: for (int i = 0; i < 14; i++) { c.getItems().removeItem(c.playerEquipment[i], i); if (c.getItems().freeSlots() >= 28) { c.getPA().movePlayer(2662, 9803, 0); } else { c.sendMessage("Your inventory needs to be empty before doing this."); return; } } break;

item.title: PI teleporting

item.description:
@lifezjoke wrote:

where do i put that, action handler i’m guessing bro?

item.title: PI teleporting
item.dc:creator: @relexlawl relexlawl
item.description:
@relexlawl wrote:

try this

for (int i = 0; i < 14; i++) {
c.getItems().removeItem(c.playerEquipment[i], i);
if (c.getItems().freeSlots() >= 28) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(Add X, Add Y, Add Height);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Your inventory needs to be empty before opening this gate.”);
return;
}
}

Read full topic
